meanings.definition: A person who sells goods or services.
meanings.sent1: The friendly salesman helped me choose the perfect gift for my mom.
meanings.sent2: The salesman at the electronics store showed me the latest smartphones.
meanings.sent3: The salesman joked that his shoes were so comfortable, they could sell themselves!
meanings.sent4: The skilled salesman weaved his words like a master storyteller, captivating his audience.
meanings.sent5: I'll never forget the enthusiastic salesman who convinced me to buy that fancy vacuum cleaner.

meanings.definition: A man who sells goods or services.
meanings.sent1: My uncle used to work as a salesman for a big car company.
meanings.sent2: The young salesman was eager to learn all about the products he was selling.
meanings.sent3: The clumsy salesman accidentally knocked over a display of glassware, creating a hilarious mess.
meanings.sent4: The old salesman's eyes sparkled with wisdom and experience as he closed yet another deal.
meanings.sent5: The persistent salesman never took no for an answer, always finding a way to make a sale.
